title: Blueberry Waffles
directions: Preheat the waffle iron. Stir together the flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar. Add the milk and eggs and stir to combine. AddÂ the melted butter, vanilla, and almond extract. Stir to combine.
Stir in the blueberries and then pour onto the hot waffle iron. Cook until lightly browned. Serve with waffle sauce or with a drizzle of maple syrup. Enjoy!
ingredients: Optional: Waffle Sauce or maple syrup for serving
